name: Pizza Margherita
description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Sushi Combo
description: Sushi Combo includes a variety of sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi, served with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi. It's a traditional Japanese dish enjoyed worldwide.

name: Hamburger
description: Hamburger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked beef patty placed inside a sliced bun, typically served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments like ketchup and mustard.

name: Pad Thai
description: Pad Thai is a Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, tofu, shrimp or chicken, bean sprouts, peanuts, egg, and a flavorful sauce made from tamarind, fish sauce, and chili.

name: Croissant
description: Croissant is a buttery, flaky pastry of Austrian origin, made of layered yeast-leavened dough. It's often enjoyed as a breakfast pastry or snack.

name: Tacos
description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with various ingredients such as seasoned meat, beans, cheese, lettuce, and salsa.

name: Sushi Burrito
description: Sushi Burrito is a fusion dish combining elements of sushi and burritos, with sushi rice, fish, vegetables, and other fillings wrapped inside a large seaweed sheet.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular Indian dish made with marinated and grilled chicken pieces served in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce, flavored with Indian spices.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Pasta Carbonara is an Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, grated cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. It's creamy, savory, and full of flavor.

name: Pho
description: Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat (typically beef or chicken), garnished with lime, chili, and bean sprouts.

name: Ramen
description: Ramen is a Japanese noodle soup dish consisting of wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and topped with various ingredients like sliced pork, seaweed, and green onions.

name: Lasagna
description: Lasagna is a traditional Italian dish made with layers of wide flat pasta, cheese, meat sauce, and other ingredients such as vegetables and herbs, baked until golden and bubbly.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Falafel Wrap is a Middle Eastern street food consisting of deep-fried chickpea balls or patties, served in a pita bread with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, tahini sauce, and pickles.

name: Poke Bowl
description: Poke Bowl is a Hawaiian dish featuring diced raw fish, typically tuna or salmon, served over rice and topped with various ingredients such as avocado, seaweed, cucumber, and soy sauce.

name: Paella
description: Paella is a Spanish rice dish originating from the Valencia region, cooked with saffron-infused rice, seafood, meats like chicken and rabbit, vegetables, and spices.

name: Biryani
description: Biryani is a South Asian mixed rice dish originating from the Indian subcontinent, made with basmati rice, spices, and meat (such as chicken, lamb, or beef), layered and cooked together to create a flavorful and aromatic dish.

name: Goulash
description: Goulash is a Hungarian stew made with beef, onions, peppers, and paprika, cooked until the meat is tender and the flavors are rich and hearty.

name: Moussaka
description: Moussaka is a Greek casserole dish made with layers of eggplant, minced meat (usually lamb or beef), tomatoes, onions, and a creamy béchamel sauce, baked until golden and bubbly.

name: Pad See Ew
description: Pad See Ew is a Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, meat (such as chicken, pork, or beef), Chinese broccoli, egg, and a sweet and savory soy-based sauce.

name: Miso Soup
description: Miso Soup is a traditional Japanese soup made with dashi broth and miso paste, often containing ingredients like tofu, seaweed, mushrooms, and green onions.

name: Moules Frites
description: Moules Frites is a Belgian dish consisting of mussels cooked with onions, celery, and white wine, served with crispy French fries and mayonnaise.

name: Chicken Adobo
description: Chicken Adobo is a Filipino dish made with chicken marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices, then simmered until tender and flavorful.

name: Ceviche
description: Ceviche is a Latin American dish made with raw fish or seafood marinated in citrus juices, such as lime or lemon, and seasoned with onions, peppers, cilantro, and chili peppers.

name: Pierogi
description: Pierogi are Polish dumplings filled with various ingredients, such as potatoes, cheese, meat, or fruit, boiled and then either fried or baked until golden and crispy.

name: Baklava
description: Baklava is a rich, sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey. It's popular in many countries in the Middle East and Mediterranean region.

name: Sauerbraten
description: Sauerbraten is a German pot roast marinated in a mixture of vinegar, water, spices, and seasonings, then slow-cooked until tender and served with gravy and potatoes.

name: Kabsa
description: Kabsa is a traditional Saudi Arabian rice dish made with long-grain rice, meat (such as chicken, lamb, or goat), vegetables, and aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Fish and Chips is a classic British dish consisting of battered and deep-fried fish (usually cod or haddock) served with thick-cut potato fries, often accompanied by tartar sauce and mushy peas.

name: Ratatouille
description: Ratatouille is a French Provencal vegetable stew made with tomatoes, eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, onions, garlic, and herbs, cooked until tender and fragrant.

name: Jollof Rice
description: Jollof Rice is a popular West African dish made with rice cooked in a flavorful tomato-based sauce, often seasoned with onions, peppers, and spices, and served with meat or fish.

name: Korean BBQ
description: Korean BBQ is a popular Korean dining experience where diners grill a variety of meats, such as beef, pork, and chicken, at their table, then wrap the grilled meat in lettuce leaves with rice, vegetables, and sauces.

name: Empanadas
description: Empanadas are savory pastries originating from Latin America, made with a filling of meat, cheese, vegetables, or sweet fillings, enclosed in pastry dough and baked or fried until golden and crispy.

name: Gyudon
description: Gyudon is a Japanese rice bowl dish consisting of thinly sliced beef, onions, and soy sauce-based broth, served over a bowl of steamed rice and garnished with green onions.

name: Shawarma
description: Shawarma is a Middle Eastern street food made with thinly sliced meat (often chicken, beef, or lamb) marinated in spices, roasted on a vertical spit, and served in a pita bread or wrap with vegetables and sauces.

name: Poutine
description: Poutine is a Canadian dish originating from Quebec, made with French fries topped with cheese curds and smothered in gravy. It's a hearty and indulgent comfort food.

name: Bakso
description: Bakso is an Indonesian meatball soup made with beef or chicken meatballs, noodles, tofu, vegetables, and a flavorful broth, often served with condiments like chili sauce and soy sauce.

name: Chimichanga
description: Chimichanga is a deep-fried burrito originating from Mexican-American cuisine, typically filled with shredded meat, beans, cheese, and spices, then deep-fried until crispy.

name: Mofongo
description: Mofongo is a Puerto Rican dish made with mashed fried plantains mixed with garlic, olive oil, and pork cracklings (chicharrón), formed into a ball or a mound, and served with broth or sauce.

name: Kofta
description: Kofta is a Middle Eastern and South Asian dish made with spiced ground meat (such as beef, lamb, or chicken) shaped into balls or cylinders and grilled or fried, often served with rice, salad, or flatbread.

name: Cevapi
description: Cevapi is a traditional Balkan dish made with grilled minced meat (usually beef, pork, or lamb) shaped into small sausages, served with flatbread (somun), chopped onions, and ajvar sauce.
